content: Anyone doing the update for the technical correction compatibility?
(helping me be able to reference it from my 4.0.0 guide)

@Grahame Grieve I'm not able to reference this one from the VhDir guide to get it updated to 4.0.1.

Publishing Content Failed: Unable to resolve the package 'hl7.fhir.uv.bulkdata'

And if I refer to it as hl7.fhir.us.bulkdata it resolves, but says

Publishing Content Failed: Package ids do not match in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/package-list.json: hl7.fhir.us.bulkdata vs hl7.fhir.uv.bulkdata (00:14.0312)

Is this due to the version mis-matches till Bulk Data is up to 4.0.1?
@Ricky Sahu do you have a chance to implement these changes?
(From GF#24434 and the issues linked from it)

@Grahame Grieve if you want a commit to debug for that BulkData issue, check the failing one of the VhDir that I've updated to 4.0.1
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/VhDir/branches/master/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-G96SCK_repo_source_examples_womens-shelter
And while you're there, can you take a peek at this one, I thought the technical correction would have fixed this one in the validator updates.
(the latest commit works, the one before has the bulkdata reference in it that fails)
I didn't see either errors in the master of VHDIr?
what is the meaning of Flat FHIR file?
what is the meaning of flat FHIR file
what is the meaning of flat FHIR file in payer to payer data exhange
